name: Route
description: Construct a road linking your capital to our city.

name: Clear Barbarian Camp
description: We feel endangered by a nearby Barbarian Camp. We request your intervention.

name: Connect Resource
description: To strengthen our civilizations, connect [tileResource] to your trade network.

name: Construct Wonder
description: We recommend that you begin construction of [wonder] to demonstrate your civilization’s strength to the world.

name: Acquire Great Person
description: Great People can alter the course of a civilization. You will receive a reward for acquiring a new [greatPerson].

name: Conquer City State
description: It is time to remove the City-State of [cityState] from the map. You will receive a substantial reward for conquering them.

name: Find Player
description: You have not yet identified where [civName] has founded its cities. You will be rewarded for locating their territories.

name: Find Natural Wonder
description: Dispatch your finest explorers to seek out Natural Wonders. The location of [naturalWonder] remains unknown.

name: Give Gold
description: We are suffering severe poverty after being robbed by [civName]. Without an infusion of Gold, collapse is only a matter of time.

name: Pledge to Protect
description: We require your protection to halt [civName]’s aggression. By issuing a Pledge of Protection, you affirm the bond that unites us.

name: Contest Culture
description: The civilization with the greatest increase in Culture will receive a reward.

name: Contest Faith
description: The civilization with the greatest increase in Faith will receive a reward.

name: Contest Technologies
description: The civilization that researches the greatest number of new Technologies will receive a reward.

name: Invest
description: A tourism boom has our people rejoicing. For a limited time, any Gold donation yields [50]% additional Influence.

name: Bully City State
description: We are weary of [cityState]’s pretensions. Whoever compels them to submit by Demanding Tribute will be rewarded.

name: Denounce Civilization
description: We have been compelled to pay tribute to [civName]. We ask you to inform the world of their wrongdoing.

name: Spread Religion
description: We have heard the tenets of [religionName] and are intrigued. Will you send missionaries to instruct us in your faith?
